subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Woody Austin, Nicholas Thompson, Peter Lonard and Briny Baird topped the Zurich Classic leader board at eight under par when rain, lightning and thunder forced the suspension of third-round play in Avondale, La. Austin had 7 holes to play, Thompson 8, Lonard 14 and Baird 15.
